alert.note: Alert for Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 9:17AM MST until January 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, an occasional reduction in visibility below one quarter mile due to blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Petroleum and Southwest Phillips Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
